General.Name: Samchuly Bicycle Co. Ltd
General.Description: Samchuly Bicycle Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of bicycles. The company offers E-bike, MTB, road, C.MTB, hybrid, fixie, minivelo, folding, city, junior, and kids cycles. It sells its products under the Lespo, Appalanchia, Collaboration, and Phantom brand names. The company was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
